title: Intersection_Eng_Spa_Fre_Ita
description:
INTERSECTION

[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/1429/entredosmzabx4.jpg[/img]

Year: 1994
Director Mark Rydell 
Cast Lolita Davidovich, Martin Landau, Richard Gere, Sharon Stone, David Selby, Jennifer Morrison, Ron White, Matthew Walker 
Length 94 min
Romantic, Drama 
Distributor Paramount 
Discs 1 DVD5 No compression
Region 2 
Video Pal
Widescreen 1.78:1 
Languages Dolby Digital 5.1: English . Dolby Surround: Spanish, French, Italian 
Subtitles English, Spanish, Croatian, French, Greek, Hebrew, Italian, Portuguese 

Synopsis
Three of todays hottest stars meet in this years most electrifying drama! Richard Gere portrays Vincent Eastman, an award-winning architect whose personal life is on shaky ground. Separated from his beautiful but aloof wife (Sharon Stone), Vincent has an affair with a joyful and passionate writer (Lolita Davidovich) whose love promises a new beginning. But Vincent remains emotionally torn between the two women, leaving his future happiness- and that of his thirteen-year-old daughter- hanging in the balance. As his relationships start to crumble, Vincent hurtles on a collision course toward the one fateful moment when he must confront his true feelings and cross the Intersection. 

Other features
Interactive Menus, Scene Access
